author: Nick Nairn
method: Toss the cooked noodles with the olive oil in a large serving bowl.  Add the rest of the ingredients, toss together and season before serving.
ingredients: 100g/3½oz noodles, cooked according to packet instructions,  1 tbsp olive oil,  ½ mango, peeled, stone removed, diced,  2 salad onions, white only, shredded,  1 red chilli, seeds removed, finely chopped,  salt and freshly ground black pepper
